class.name: MediaPipeProto
class.description: Protobuf is a platform-agnostic and language-agnostic way of describing data structures. Protobuf is extensively used in MediaPipe framework.

method.name: duplicate
method.description: Returns a new copy of the proto.

method.name: get_field
method.description: Gets the value of proto field [param field_name]. Returns [code]null[/code] if the field does not exist. To get nested field value, use [code]/[/code] as separator.

method.name: get_fields
method.description: Returns the list of proto fields. Returns empty array if the proto is not initialized.

method.name: get_packet
method.description: Gets a [MediaPipePacket] which contain the proto. Returns [code]null[/code] if the proto is not initialized.

method.name: get_repeated_field
method.description: Gets the value of repeated field [param field_name] at [param index]. Returns [code]null[/code] if the field is not repeated or does not exist.

method.name: get_repeated_field_size
method.description: Gets the size of repeated field [param field_name].

method.name: get_type_name
method.description: Gets the type name of the proto. Returns empty string if the proto is not initialized.

method.name: initialize
method.description: Initializes the proto with the type [param type_name]. Returns [code]true[/code] on success.

method.name: is_initialized
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the proto is initialized.

method.name: is_repeated_field
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the proto field [param field_name] is repeated.

method.name: parse_from_buffer
method.description: Parses [param buffer] into the proto. The proto need to be initialized with the expected type before parsing the buffer.

method.name: parse_from_string
method.description: Parses [param string] into the proto. The proto need to be initialized with the expected type before parsing the string.

method.name: serialize_to_buffer
method.description: Serializes the proto to byte array.

method.name: set_field
method.description: Sets the proto field [param field_name] with [param value]. Returns [code]true[/code] on success.
